That's what I'm thinking but I can't test it right now. Not sure if we need
something like apt's --purge.
On Thu, Sep 29, 2016 at 01:37 gunan notifications@github.com wrote:

simply pip uninstall, then pip install?

body:
That's what I'm thinking but I can't test it right now. Not sure if we need
something like apt's --purge.
On Thu, Sep 29, 2016 at 01:37 gunan notifications@github.com wrote:

> simply pip uninstall, then pip install?
